command.name: messages
command.commandText: SELECT a.Id, a.SendTo, a.SendFrom, a.CreateTime, a.[Type], a.Content, a.PictureUrl, a.MediaId , b.Nickname AS 'User_Nickname', b.HeadImageUrl AS 'User_HeadImageUrl', b.Remark as 'User_Remark' FROM conference2017.dbo.[Message] (NOLOCK) a LEFT JOIN conference2017.dbo.UserInfo (NOLOCK) b ON a.SendFrom = b.OpenId WHERE [Type] = @Type ORDER BY CreateTime DESC
